author: Amy Duncan
title: Charlotte Crosbyâ€™s dramatic transformation continues as fans plead with her to stop surgery
text:
A post shared by Charlotte Letitia Crosby (@charlottegshore) on Mar 20, 2017 at 5:25am PDT 
If youâ€™re a celebrity â€“ particularly a high profile reality TV star â€“ you canâ€™t get away with making even the subtlest of changes to your image without the world and its wife noticing.
Lady visited by George Clooney on her birthday says he was as charming as you'd expect So when Charlotte Crosby unveiled an even fuller pout and new blue eyes, it naturally didnâ€™t go unnoticed.
Charlotte showed off her new â€“ almost unrecognisable â€“ look on Instagram on Monday. But concerned fans quickly commented underneath her latest photo upload, warning her sheâ€™s starting to look like a â€˜fishâ€™ thanks to her trout pout, with some even saying sheâ€™s looking like the late Pete Burns, who famously underwent a number of lip filler surgeries.
The black and white photo shows Charlotte posing for the camera whilst sat in a restaurant â€“ but itâ€™s her huge lips which steal the show.
Coupled with her new nose, which she treated herself to last year, as well as a pair of icy blue contact lenses, itâ€™s a striking difference to the Charlotte we were introduced to back in 2011 when she found fame on Geordie Shore.
And fans who have followed her rise to fame aired their concerns underneath her latest pic, with one writing, â€˜Wtf [what the fuck] happened to your lips that looks terrible,â€™ while another simply wrote: â€˜Ewwww her lipsâ€™.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Other comments read: â€˜God please stop ruining your face!!!â€™, â€˜What did you do to your lipsâ€™, and â€˜WTF. You look so unnaturalâ€™.
Another post simply said: â€˜Pete Burnsâ€™.
This photo, which Charlotte captioned with emojis, isnâ€™t the only snap to spark fears amongst her devotees that sheâ€™s undergoing too much surgery, with a number of recent snaps she has posted getting a similar reaction.

A post shared by Charlotte Letitia Crosby (@charlottegshore) on Mar 16, 2017 at 6:37pm PDT 
Wet hair & tequila 
A post shared by Charlotte Letitia Crosby (@charlottegshore) on Mar 18, 2017 at 8:28am PDT 
A Snapchat video from last week was particularly worrying to some viewers, with the footage showing off very plump lips, and many fans took to Twitter to vent their worry for the 26-year-old TV star.
I'm all for cosmetic surgery but honestly charlotte crosby looks like she can't bloody control her lips anymore it's ridic
â€” quavo (@summerfoz) March 20, 2017 
Charlotte Crosby's lips 
â€” meg_ (@meganjaneeex) March 20, 2017 
What the fuck has Charlotte Crosby done to her lips ğŸ¤¢
â€” Olivia (@livbristt) March 20, 2017 
Search up Charlotte Crosby without plump lips and blue contacts she's almost unrecognisable 
â€” Gossip Queen (@GossipQ46821546) March 17, 2017 
Wtf is Charlotte Crosby doing to her face. She's resembling Pete burns with those lips and cheeks #whenplasticaintfantastic 
â€” carley warren (@carleywozza) March 15, 2017 
Charlotte Crosby's lips look awfulğŸ¤· â™€ï¸. Like literally looking like a fish..
â€” KaiBella (@kai187_) March 11, 2017 

Charlotte, who is planning to start a family with boyfriend Stephen Bear , has previously spoken openly about cosmetic surgery in the past.
In February last year she unveiled her new nose , openly sharing before and after pictures with fans at the time.
I can finally talk about my Nose surgery, want to say a big thanks to @elitesurgical1 ! #MrHassan works miracles pic.twitter.com/bDlXUv10hu 
â€” Charlotte Crosby (@Charlottegshore) February 11, 2016 

Her nose job didnâ€™t go down well with Janet Street Porter, who famously grilled her during an appearance on Loose Women for being a bad role model to young fans.
Charlotte said at the time: â€˜A lot of people donâ€™t think it looked wrong before, but I had a big arch.
â€˜I did think it wasnâ€™t a good message to put across but itâ€™s my choice at the end of the day.â€™

She addressed negative comments she had received after going under the knife so publicly in an interview with Closer magazine at the time.
She said: â€˜I didnâ€™t think everyone was going to say: â€œWow, it looks amazingâ€, I knew half would love it and half would hate it. But I feel great. Surgery has made me feel so much more confident.
â€˜I can see why people become addicted because, when I has my nose done, something that looked awful then looked amazing in a matter of three hours, but itâ€™d only be addictive if you hated so much about yourself, you wanted to change everything â€“ luckily I only hated my nose.â€™

And she didnâ€™t rule out getting more surgery done, adding: â€˜Maybe when Iâ€™m 53 I might have a face-lift if it starts to sag loads. Or maybe Iâ€™ll get a designer vagina when Iâ€™m in my 30s! Lots of people get it done when they have a baby.â€™
And in January this year, she posted a Snapchat video showing her having her eyebrows tattooed on.
In the short clip, Crosby says to the camera: â€˜Iâ€™ve just had my eyebrows drawn in and weâ€™re about to start tattooing.â€™
